dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1976
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: "The joyful story of the opening of Maryhouse." Filled with gratitude she describes applying the finishing touches. Notes the large auditorium used for Friday meetings started by Peter Maurin.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 567 1976-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
